Plugin Roadmap

The following enhancement to the plugin are planned for the near future

  • Support for more package types - e.g. support for ejb
  • A scan activity report identifying scanned projects, errors etc. to aid users in the verification step.
  • Option for Maven build to fail if scan violates "critical policies"

Please submit bug reports and enhancement requests to the project team.
